raw_text: We take MST Parser to be our underlying parsing model and use it as a testbed on which to evaluate the effectiveness ofour method for various data conditions.2 Byinstantiating the basic MSTParser features over coarse parts of speech, we construct a state-of-the-art delexical ized parser in the style of McDonald et al2011), where feature weights can be directly transferred from a source language or languages to a desired target language
clean_text: By instantiating the basic MST Parser features over coarse parts of speech, we construct a state-of-the-art delexicalized parser in the style of McDonald et al (2011).
